## MengfeiXiao

The goal of "MengfeiXiao" is to submit the Homework 5 for GS5072 Modern Data Structure, and still create a function to write a song of beautiful lyrics.


## Installation

You can install the released version of "MengfeiXiao" from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("MengfeiXiao")
```
